messages.content: This election is our opportunity to finally get Brexit done, so we can focus on the issues that actually matter to Newcastle.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will work constructively with the council and local businesses to regenerate the Ryecroft site and secure from the government the best possible Town Deal, as part of the up to £25m funding that Newcastle will receive.

As I have worked in software for bet365 for the past 3 years and also co-own a startup in Newcastle, I am well-placed to help bring high-quality jobs and build on the recent £23m investment into the Keele University Enterprise Zone.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Crack Down on Anti-Social Behaviour and Rural Crime
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our Conservative council are implementing state-of-the-art CCTV coverage in the town centre. I will work with local councillors and the Police to crack down on anti-social behaviour and tackle rural crime.
My children were born at the Royal Stoke, and I will push to make sure we get our share of the £33.9 billion extra the Government has announced to deliver more beds and reduce waiting times.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Deliver Brexit for the People of Newcastle
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Along with 63% of Newcastle residents, I voted Leave. Our Conservative government are implementing the withdrawal agreement to deliver Brexit by January and without further delay. With your support we will implement the best Brexit deal for our town.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Along with the majority of Newcastle residents, I voted to Leave the European Union and I am very dismayed that this town has been represented for so long by an MP determined to overturn the referendum result.

issues.brexitEurope: Almost two thirds of people in Newcastle voted to Leave, and I am determined to finally deliver Brexit, with the great new deal secured by Boris Johnson.
issues.health: My children were born at the Royal Stoke, and I will push to make sure we get our share of the £33.9 billion extra the Government has announced to deliver more beds and reduce waiting times.

leaflet.personalStatement: Once we finally deliver Brexit – we can unite the country.

personalStories.story: My children were born at the Royal Stoke.

examples: The Lib Dems want to cancel Brexit, and we can’t afford more indecision and delay.
